edu.nyu.pqs.stopwatch.impl

Class StopwatchFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.nyu.pqs.stopwatch.impl.StopwatchFactory

  • public class StopwatchFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    The StopwatchFactory is a thread-safe factory class for IStopwatch objects. It maintains references to all created IStopwatch objects and provides a convenient method for getting a list of those objects.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Stopwatch getStopwatch(java.lang.String id)
      Creates and returns a new Stopwatch object
      static java.util.List<Stopwatch> getStopwatches()
      Returns a list of all created stopwatches

    • Method Detail

      • getStopwatch

        public static Stopwatch getStopwatch(java.lang.String id)
        Creates and returns a new Stopwatch object
        Parameters:
        id - The identifier of the new object
        Returns:
        The new IStopwatch object
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if id is empty, null, or already taken.

      • getStopwatches

        public static java.util.List<Stopwatch> getStopwatches()
        Returns a list of all created stopwatches
        Returns:
        a List of all creates Stopwatch objects. Returns an empty list if no Stopwatches have been created.
